analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na akusalam dhammam paccayā dassanena pahātabba hetuko

original: akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā
analyzed: akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā

original: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena
analyzed: na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na iva dassanena

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
